TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StaticPartialCachingControl extends System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl

summary.span: 表示 類別的執行個體，這個類別會指定給輸出快取，並以宣告方式包含在頁面或另一個使用者控制項中。

span.span: Represents an instance of the class that is specified for output caching and included declaratively in a page or another user control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者控制項指定的輸出快取，在宣告式的.ascx 檔案中，使用指示詞時，會建立此類別的執行個體或使用者控制項的程式碼後置檔案中的類別。An instance of this class is created when a user control is specified for output caching, using either an directive in the declarative .ascx file, or the class in the user control's code-behind file. 使用者控制其包含網頁中的宣告方式包含時 (使用動態地相對於載入方法中的控制項類別)，則執行個體位於與頁面控制項階層架構快取的使用者控制項的父代。When the user control is included declaratively in its containing page (as opposed to being dynamically loaded using the method in the control class), the instance is placed in the control hierarchy of the page as a parent to the cached user control.

summary.span: 建立 物件，以包含快取的伺服器控制項內容。

span.span: Creates the object to contain the cached server control content.

MemberSignature.Value: public StaticPartialCachingControl (string ctrlID, string guid, int duration, string varyByParams, string varyByControls, string varyByCustom, System.Web.UI.BuildMethod buildMethod);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string ctrlID, string guid, int32 duration, string varyByParams, string varyByControls, string varyByCustom, class System.Web.UI.BuildMethod buildMethod) cil managed

public: StaticPartialCachingControl(System::String ^ ctrlID, System::String ^ guid, int duration, System::String ^ varyByParams, System::String ^ varyByControls, System::String ^ varyByCustom, System::Web::UI::BuildMethod ^ buildMethod);

param.name: ctrlID
param.span: ASP.NET 指派給伺服器控制項的識別項。

span.span: The identifier assigned to the server control by ASP.NET.

param.name: guid
param.span: 從伺服器控制項傳遞的全域唯一識別碼。

span.span: The globally unique identifier passed from the server control.

param.name: duration
param.span: 伺服器控制項保留在快取中的時間長度。

span.span: The length of time the server control is to remain in the cache.

param.name: varyByParams
param.span: 查詢字串或表單 POST 參數的字串，用來變更快取中的使用者控制項。

span.span: A string of the query string or form POST parameters by which to vary the user control in the cache.

param.name: varyByControls
param.span: 伺服器控制項屬性的字串，用來變更快取中的使用者控制項。

span.span: A string of the server control properties by which to vary the user control in the cache.

param.name: varyByCustom
param.span: 使用者定義的字串，其中包含自訂輸出快取參數值。

span.span: A user-defined string that contains custom output-cache parameter values.

param.name: buildMethod
param.span: 呼叫方法來建立 的委派。

span.span: A delegate that calls the method to build the .

summary.span: 建立 物件，以包含快取的伺服器控制項內容。

span.span: Creates the object to contain the cached server control content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式適用於 ASP.NET 網頁架構，並不應該由開發人員直接呼叫。The constructor is intended for use by the ASP.NET page framework and should not be called directly by developers.

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string ctrlID, string guid, int32 duration, string varyByParams, string varyByControls, string varyByCustom, string sqlDependency, class System.Web.UI.BuildMethod buildMethod, string providerName) cil managed

public: StaticPartialCachingControl(System::String ^ ctrlID, System::String ^ guid, int duration, System::String ^ varyByParams, System::String ^ varyByControls, System::String ^ varyByCustom, System::String ^ sqlDependency, System::Web::UI::BuildMethod ^ buildMethod, System::String ^ providerName);

param.name: ctrlID
param.span: ASP.NET 指派給控制項的識別項。

span.span: The ID that is assigned to the control by ASP.NET.

param.name: guid
param.span: 快取控制項的全域唯一識別項 (GUID)。

span.span: The globally unique identifier (GUID) for the cached control.

param.name: duration
param.span: 快取控制項輸出的時間長度。

span.span: The length of time that the control's output is cached.

param.name: varyByParams
param.span: 查詢字串或表單 POST 參數的字串，用來變更快取中的使用者控制項。

span.span: A string of the query string or form POST parameters by which to vary the user control in the cache.

param.name: varyByControls
param.span: 列出伺服器控制屬性 (Property) 的字串，用於變更快取中的使用者控制項。

span.span: A string that lists the server-control properties by which to vary the user control in the cache.

param.name: varyByCustom
param.span: 使用者定義的字串，其中包含自訂輸出快取參數值。

span.span: A user-defined string that contains custom output-cache parameter values.

param.name: sqlDependency
param.span: 以分號分隔的字串，可指定要針對 Microsoft SQL Server 快取相依性使用的資料庫與資料表。

span.span: A semicolon-delimited string that specifies which databases and tables to use for the Microsoft SQL Server cache dependency.

param.name: buildMethod
param.span: 委派，會呼叫建置控制項的方法。

span.span: A delegate that calls the method that builds the control.

param.name: providerName
param.span: 用來儲存輸出快取控制項的提供者名稱。

span.span: The name of the provider that is used to store the output-cached control.

summary.span: 針對 .ascx 檔中定義的控制項，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for a control that is defined in an .ascx file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定控制項，輸出快取提供者，以宣告方式或使用程式碼中。You can specify an output-cache provider for a control, either declaratively or by using the in code.

summary.span: 建置使用者控制項 (.ascx 檔案) 中的 物件，並將它加入至包含的伺服器控制項。

span.span: Builds a object in the user control (.ascx file) and adds it to the containing server control.

summary.span: 以使用者控制項 (.ascx 檔案) 中指定的參數，建置 物件，並將它當做已剖析子物件加入至包含的伺服器控制項。

span.span: Builds a object with the parameters specified in the user control (.ascx file) and adds it as a parsed sub-object to the containing server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建置到 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫資料表沒有關聯性的快取的控制項。The method builds a cached control with no relationship to a Microsoft SQL Server database table. 方法適用於由 ASP.NET 網頁架構，並不應該由開發人員直接呼叫。The method is intended for use by the ASP.NET page framework and should not be called directly by developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立具有所指定的 SQL Server 資料庫資料表的關聯性的快取的控制項`sqlDependency`參數。The method builds a cached control with a relationship to a SQL Server database table specified by the `sqlDependency` parameter. 方法適用於由 ASP.NET 網頁架構，並不應該由開發人員直接呼叫。The method is intended for use by the ASP.NET page framework and should not be called directly by developers.
